comment.body:
Some of us also just aren't religious. ðŸ™ƒ Death becomes sort of a problem when you're lacking in spiritual belief and most of the time I need to tell myself that it's just another mystery to solve to keep from hyper ventilating over it.

I'm completely open with everything about myself (read as I'm an over sharer). Feel free to ask me anything.
I've been reading that there's been an influx of new faces to Zeronet. Maybe that's the reason?
